title: Statement by the President on Ash Wednesday | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
February 22, 2012

 



Statement by the President on Ash Wednesday





	Today, Michelle and I honor Ash Wednesday with Christians around the country and across the world. This is at once a solemn and joyous occasion, an opportunity to remember both the depths of sacrifice and the height of redemption.Â  We join millions in entering the Lenten Season with truly thankful hearts, mindful of our faith and our obligations to one another.
